column5: The Leafs and Habs game on Saturday was broadcast in 3D, and apparently a group of people(?) turned up wearing 3D glasses, and then quite seriously complained to staff that things didn't look any different. If true then I wouldn't even let them be blood donors, that level of stupidity is probably contagious.
Now that's funny Dave.. Although I am not sure if it was meant to be
sounds like my in-laws attended the game
I'da been mad too......Drive all the way from Montreal and get there to find that 3D isnt working ??
Build a better world, the world builds a better idiot..
